original_title: Playboy Wet and Wild: The Complete Collection
overview: For the first time in Playboy's history, the entire Wet & Wild series is available in one unbelievable soaking set! From irresistible icons Pamela Anderson and Jenny McCarthy to Playmate favorites Shae Marks, Stacey Sanches, Julie Lynn Cialini, Summer Altice, Shannon Stewart and Nicole Lenz, these are the hottest bods yet -- naughtier than ever on a non-stop mission to get clean! From sweltering sandy beaches to sudsy car washes you'll soak in every satisfying moment from more than nine hours of the wettest, sexiest scenarios. Whether you're a long-time fan or a relative newcomer to this ultra-popular 10-part collection, this sizzling series will leave you drenched with desire and begging for more.
title: Playboy Wet and Wild: The Complete Collection
